description: This file defines the CartAdapter class, a RecyclerView adapter for displaying and managing shopping cart items in an Android app. It manages item views, data binding, and user interactions such as incrementing, decrementing, and removing cart lines.

classes.name: CartAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying cart items with handlers for incrementing, decrementing, and removing items.

classes.name: CartAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that holds references to the UI components for a cart item.

methods.name: CartAdapter
methods.description: Constructor initializing the adapter with callback functions for increment, decrement, and remove actions.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: An object extending DiffUtil.ItemCallback for efficient item difference checking.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder by inflating the item_cart layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a CartLine to the ViewHolder's UI components and sets up click listeners.
